games.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale game developed by Infinity Ward and Raven Software. It features both multiplayer and battle royale gameplay modes.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo Switch and Wii U consoles. It is part of The Legend of Zelda series.

games.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI
games.description: A turn-based strategy game developed by Firaxis Games and published by 2K Games. It is the sixth main installment in the Civilization series.

games.name: The Sims 4
games.description: A life simulation game developed by Maxis and published by Electronic Arts. It is the fourth major title in The Sims series.

games.name: Portal 2
games.description: A puzzle-platform game developed by Valve. It is the sequel to Portal (2007) and introduces new gameplay elements.

games.name: Forza Horizon 5
games.description: An open-world racing game developed by Playground Games and published by Xbox Game Studios. It is the fifth installment in the Forza Horizon series.

games.name: FIFA 22
games.description: A football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series. It is the 29th installment in the series.

games.name: Mortal Kombat 11
games.description: A fighting game developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the eleventh main installment in the Mortal Kombat series.

games.name: Celeste
games.description: A platforming video game developed by Maddy Makes Games. It follows a young woman named Madeline as she climbs the titular Celeste Mountain, overcoming challenges and self-doubt.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox video game developed by Mojang Studios. It allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world, requiring creativity from players.
